abstract.text: BlendVision One iOS Player SDK
Contains config values which can be used to alter the behaviour of the player when it comes to remote playback.
Represents an event indicating a change in the loop state of a player.
Contains config values regarding the behaviour of the bitrate adaptation.
Represents a Widevine DRM config.
This config is used to configure the poster view
An enumeration representing the analytics fields used in the application.
Project version string for KKSPlayer.
Defines listener methods for all events available for the PlayerView.
BlendVision One iOS Player SDK
Project version number for KKSPlayer.
Contains config values which can be used to alter the visual presentation and behavior of the player UI.
Player buffer config object to configure buffering behavior.
Represents a FairPlay Streaming DRM config.
Represents a VTT thumbnail.
Listener protocol which can be used to listen to events of the CastManager.
The options to be used for initializing CastManager
Configures a new Player instance. Must not be modified after it was used to create a Player instance.
An object that provides the interface to control the players transport behavior.
Enumerates the different available remote device types.
Defines listener methods for all events available for the Player
Used for configuring casting options.
Singleton providing access to GoogleCast related features.
The CastManager needs to be initialized by calling CastManager#initializeCasting in the AppDelegate of the application which should support casting.
apiError format: apiErrorCode(20) + httpStatusCode(such as 403) = 20403
Represents an event indicating changes in the loop.

for print and collect debug log under global scope.
Provides options to configure Picture in Picture playback.
